I was ill on and off for the past 10 years.   However, since I have learned=
 
about you guys, and what you have all been  sharing, and with me working =
on 
it myself, I have not been sick.  I am  still really new at this, I onl=
y 
started doing this since March of 09, and  I've collected, and kept all =
the 
raw data, plus what i tried to pull out of the  files, it was harder t=
hen 
because I didn't know how to work with it I still  don't know what to =
do with 
Goldwave, but Kristin is the one that told me about  Goldwave, it =
is easy to 
save files, and just recently I learned how to make the  wav fi=
les mp3's most 
of the older files are still in Wav format.
 
All  i do now=
, is make their words louder, and try  to pull them out, from 
the other vo=
ices, that get in the way.  As far as  "listening to negative  
entities" l=
ook at what goes on in this world, don't  we have enough negative 
stuff to=
 worry about already?  I just don't enjoy  encouraging them to keep 
it up,=
 feeding into the negatives only makes them  stronger, and does not 
set a =
very good example it's like what a philosophy  professor once told a 
class=
 back I took one, students could  understand him, oh yes, he spoke clearly =

perfect English, but the man spoke 8  languages fluently, wrote several 
b=
ooks;  "I speak to lift this  class up to my level of understanding, so you=
 
will learn, I will not  lower myself to your level, you are all here to 
=
learn."    Difficult class?  Very much so, and no student ever managed to g=
et an  
A or B in his class one was lucky to get a C + in that class, and I=
 had 3.9 
in  all of my undergraduate work, and a 4.0 in what PhD credits I=
 
accumulated.   But of all the science classes I took, the biology's, chem=
istry's,  
theology, physics, all of them, that was by far the most challen=
ging  ever, but 
boy was it interesting! sf
 
 
 
In a message dated 6/2/20=
10 2:28:19 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@... writes:

 
 
 
=
Snowfire, based on your hearing of all the negative  entities, do you think=
 
listening to them could cause a person to become  ill, or more negative? =
If 
so, what do you think the symptoms of that  would be?  That is, what ki=
nd 
of behavior would a person exhibit  who had become, perhaps dangerously=
, 
effected?


--- On Wed,  6/2/10, SnowfireL@...,<SnowfireL@...>  =
wrote:


From:  SnowfireL@...<SnowfireL@...>
Subject: Re:  [EVP-IT=
C] Re: music
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
Date:  Wednesday, June 2, 2010, 10=
:11 AM


 
... I don't think it is good to pass that  negative stuff around=
, there is 
enough of that on these lists  already.  ..
 
 
In a message da=
ted 6/2/2010 12:42:44 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
clockdryve@yahoo. com w=
rites:

 
I get the last part "play some music". But what is the first  par=
t"? I have 
a terrible time with these slashed bits of  voice.

--- In _EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups  .com_ 
(mip://0d4acee0/mc/compose?to=3DEVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com) , SnowfireL@.. . wrote:
>
> This is very clear  to me, see if you ca=
n hear. sf
